title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is working.
EB: The expected behavior is that when updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, a busy cursor should be shown to provide feedback and indicate that the system is actively processing the changes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Go to the Export Zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Press the 'OK' button.
